description: I don't like the printed tables of nova-manage and would prefer using prettytable.
title: use prettytable for nova-manage

comments.content:
I don't like the printed tables of nova-manage and would prefer using prettytable.

example with prettytable: 

stack@devstack001:~$ nova-manage --flagfile nova/bin/nova.conf service list
+------------------+-------------+------+---------+-------+---------------------+
|      Binary      |     Host    | Zone |  Status | State |      Updated_At     |
+------------------+-------------+------+---------+-------+---------------------+
| nova-compute     | devstack001 | nova | enabled | :-)   | 2012-01-27 20:58:23 |
| nova-cert        | devstack001 | nova | enabled | :-)   | 2012-01-27 20:58:21 |
| nova-volume      | devstack001 | nova | enabled | :-)   | 2012-01-27 20:58:23 |
| nova-network     | devstack001 | nova | enabled | :-)   | 2012-01-27 20:58:25 |
| nova-scheduler   | devstack001 | nova | enabled | :-)   | 2012-01-27 20:58:17 |
| nova-consoleauth | devstack001 | nova | enabled | :-)   | 2012-01-27 20:58:18 |
+------------------+-------------+------+---------+-------+---------------------+
